CustomField.description: If set, the lifecycle stage action will be executed only for this many recipients selected randomly from the eligible set of recipients e.g. send survey to randomly selected 50 campaign members only.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This setting limits the number of recipients to whom the survey will be sent when the recipient filter criteria result in a large number of recipients. The specified number of recipients will be randomly selected from the total pool of recipients meeting the criteria.
CustomField.label: Limit Number of Recipients
